{{also|他妈的}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=他妈的}}

===Etymology===
Etymology unclear. Literally: "his mother's". Possibly an abbreviated form of {{m|zh|[[肏]]他媽的[[屄]]||fuck his mother's vagina}}, a profanity phrase which is circumlocutory for {{m|zh|肏[[你]]媽的屄||fuck your mother's vagina}}, with the initial and final profanity characters omitted.
